name: spinthewheel
short: Spin the wheel with custom item labels
description: This cog allows the bot owner to add items to wheels and spin them whence the bot creates and sends a gif of the wheel spinning. Items can have arbitrary labels and rarities (these affect the outcome of the wheel spin).
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing spinthewheel!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
